decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Design and Access Statement and Unnumbered Existing and Proposed Drive-Thru Capacity Plan, received on 15/01/2018;
7105_AEW_0525_0001, 7105_AEW_0525_0003/A, 7105_AEW_0525_0002/A, 7105_AEW_0525_0004/A, 7105_AEW_0525_0005, 7105_AEW_0525_0009, 7105_AEW_0525_0018, 7105_AEW_0525_0045/A, 7104_AEW_0525_0050/A, McDonalds/002/2008, McDonalds/002/2008, McDonalds/132/2010, McD/043/2013/A, Unnumbered Order Post Elevations (Sign 9), received on 13/11/2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those specified within the plans and application form hereby approved.

Condition : 5 - The extensions and buildings hereby permitted shall be used for purpose ancillary to the use of the existing premises and for no other purpose (including any other purpose in Class       of the Schedule to the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987, or in any provision equivalent to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification).

Condition : 6 - The waste and recycled materials storage arrangements shown on the approved drawing shall be completed before any part of the accommodation hereby permitted is occupied.  No waste or recycling materials shall be stored outside of either the main restaurant premises or within the dedicated storage facility.
description: Erection of a single storey extension with alterations to elevations to include additional cladding, alterations to the roof and drive thru booths, reconfiguration of the drive thru lane, car park and kerb lines, two customer order displays and a height restrictor goal post, construction of a new refuse storage area.
